name: Keep It Steaming
description:
Welcome conductor Mink!
Mink, you have a long journey ahead!
Repair the train, keep the people onboard company, and ensure the train travels as far as possible!

In this game, you’ll be playing the character “Mink” who is a train conductor. He is used to long journeys by train, but this trip is like no other. The train keeps falling apart. Help him with managing the train, to travel as far as possible!

Keep It Steaming!

Controls:

  • Left: A
  • Right: D
  • Interact with furniture: E
  • Interact in minigames: Left mouse click OR E

When something needs to be repaired it will light up in green!
